aurininnovation 0.1.0

    Industrial Growth Opportunities

    Innovation metrics of SA2 regions for 2011 and 2016.

    regional_innovation.Rd

    A dataset containing a measure of innovation, inputs to innovation, and other innovation metrics for SA2 regions.

    Usage

    regional_innovation

    Format

    A data frame with 4325 rows and 20 variables:

    sa2_name

    name of the sa2 region. For 2011, uses the 2011 Australian Statistical Geography Standard. For 2016, uses the 2016 Australian Statistical Geography Standard

    sa2_code

    8-digit code assigned to the sa2 name

    year
    patents

    number of patents per 1000 workers

    backwards_citations

    number of backward citations

    designs

    number of designs per 1000 workers

    trademarks

    number of trademarks per 1000 workers

    plants

    number of plant breeder rights applications per 1000 workers

    kibs

    proportion of workers in knowledge intensive business services

    skill

    average skill level of region occupations

    owner_managers

    proportion of owner-managers

    unis

    number of universities

    tafes

    number of tafes

    qualification

    average education level of workers

    stem

    proportion of workers with a stem qualification

    employment

    total employment

    infrastructure

    number of universities and tafes

    human_knowledge

    factor derived from kibs, skill, and qualification

    patent_output

    factor derived from patents and backwards citations

    innovation

    second-order factor derived from human_knowledge and patent_output
